veclass.class_definition: A Cognizer expects a Phenomenon that comes from a Source.
A Protagonist anticipates an Event_expected.

veclass.classnote: State meaning

veclass.class_definition: An Entity began its existence in the context of an Origin, which can be a place, culture, time period, text, etc.
An Event happens to an Undergoer.
An Agent works on fine-tuning a Project so that it changes towards a desirable or perfect state.
A Perpetrator does something not permitted by the law or something seen as undesirable.

veclass.classnote: This class merges the general class "supply/deliver" with the embedded class "import" and "bring".

veclass.class_definition: An Authority allows an Affected entity to engage in a Permitted entity.
A Cognizer finds out about some Information from a Source.
An Agent keeps an Entity in a State.
veclass.classnote: State meaning

veclass.class_definition: A Stimulus brings about (induces) a Phenomenon based on an experience with a previous Phenomenon.
An Entity exists.
An Explosive explodes, erupts.
A group of Arguers (also expressible as Arguer1 and Arguer2) express incompatible opinions or beliefs about an Issue.
An Agent expresses one's preference for a Chosen entity by voting for it.
A Seeker looks for a Sought entity.
A Mover changes location from Area_1 to Area_2.
veclass.classnote: Valency frame revision needed: The valency frame for hnout se(PDT-Vallex-ID-v-w1073f1) includes both basic and abstrakt meaning, should be split. For now, this class represents the basic meaning.

"Valency frame revision needed for valency frames (class members) with EFF in this class: RCMP functor (Recompense) is used instead of EFF in newer FGD valency theory, reflected in VALLEX lexicon only. RCMP is not part of the valency frame, therefore no mapping needed for this slot." In the PDT_vallex and EngVallex the only valency frame for this class should be "ACT, ADDR, PAT" instead of " ACT, ADDR, PAT, EFF" or "ACT, ADDR EXT, PAT". This restrictions hold for the whole class, cf. class "splácet, splatit, platit, etc." RCMP is not part of the valency frame, therefore no mapping needed for this slot.

veclass.class_definition: A Defender protects an Entity from an Undesirable entity.
A Mover uses a Vehicle as a means of transport in an Area.
An Entity is allotted or spent for a Purpose.
An Item changes its position on a scale from a higher starting point (Value_initial) to a lower end point (Value_final) by a magnitude of this change (Difference).

The Owner_initial gives Entity_1 to the Owner_final and receives Entity_2 in exchange.
A Speaker discusses some Information with Audience_Addressee.
A Thinker holds a particular Judgment about a Phenomenon.
An Offerer makes available, accessible or provides an Offered entity to a Recipient.
veclass.classnote: Valency frame revision needed for verbs with EFF: RCMP functor (Recompense) is used instead of EFF in newer FGD valency theory, reflected in VALLEX lexicon only. RCMP is not part of the valency frame, therefore no mapping needed for this slot with many of the class members.

veclass.class_definition: A Buyer provides Payment to a Seller for Goods that will go to a Party_benefited .

veclass.class_definition: A Perpetrator rapes a Victim.
An Item multiplies from a State_initial to a State_final.
A Cause pollutes an Affected entity.
A Cause fills an Experiencer with distaste.
A Generalizing entity draws Generalized entities by inferring from specific cases.
An Authority is accountable, responsible for an Action to a Protagonist.
A Perpetrator defrauds an Asset of a Victim.
An Agent puts a Goal into effect.
A Creator reconstructs a Source into a Result.
A Changing entity speeds up from a Value_initial to a Value_final.
A Compared_1 entity identifies with a Compared_2 entity about a Phenomenon.
A Protagonist damages the reputation of an Affected entity.
A Loser fails to profit on a Value due to a Cause.
A Mover orients a Moved entity upwards.
A Source makes a loud, sonorous sound, like a bell.
A Force causes an Instrument to make a loud, sonorous sound, like a bell.
A Changing entity turns a Changed entity from a State_initial to a State_final.
A Changing entity degenerates to an Undesirable entity.
A Perceiver is amazed by a Perceived entity.
A Scrounger begs for a Desirable entity.
